        public Room(java.lang.String description,
            Room north,
            Room east,
            Room south,
            Room west,
            java.util.List<Thing> things)
        Constructor specifying the description of this room and all the connecting rooms of this room and the list of things in this room.
        Parameters:
        description - the room description
        north - the room to the north
        east - the room to the east
        south - the room to the south
        west - the room to the west
        things - the list of things in the room
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if description or things is null
